channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-9792] Region states should update last assignments when a region is opened.
item.description: Currently, we update a region's last assignment region server when the region is online. We should do this sooner, when the region is moved to OPEN state. CM could kill this region server before we delete the znode and online the region.
item.summary: Region states should update last assignments when a region is opened.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Attached patch moved the last assignment update from regionOnline() to updateRegionStates().

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12608965/trunk-9792.patch
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

+1 hadoop1.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 1.0 profile.

+1 hadoop2.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 2.0 profile.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

-1 site. The patch appears to cause mvn site goal to fail.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

This message is automatically generated.
Patch makes sense; are you addressing a particular bug?
Yes, there is some other problem. I am thinking about a best way to fix it. The issue is that some region is just open but the server is killed by CM. The region is not reached OPEN state yet.

+1 on patch.

Is there an issue for 'some other problem' noted above?

I have a patch for all similar problems. But I have not optimized it since I am trying to find out how online schema change (change encoding) could cause data loss. If someone can take a look at HBASE-9818, it will be very helpful.

This message is automatically generated.
Patch makes sense on code level, although I don;t think I fully understand OFFLINE-related changes
Attached v3 that fixed failed tests, an issue with the master recovery case.
As to the offline-related changes, it is to handle crashed region servers while regions are in transition, in which case a region could be assigned and master doesn't know about it yet.
